values: Ellarose: So.. I see you got a pair of pants... *leans in closer* Amadeus: Erm.. Saria: Thank GOD, that woman is finally gone off somewhere. It's nice to have the quiet! Saria: Oh! Ellarose: Oh, hello dear. Do you want something? Saria: ... *runs off* Amadeus: O.o Ellarose: Now then, where were we? Amadeus: Look... Um.. Saria, right? Amadeus: Get OFF! Amadeus: That was just.. just -mean-. *storms off* Ellarose: But...

Ellarose: Oh, hello. I just came by to introduce myself properly. Amadeus: Uh, hi... Ellarose: I really need to appologize for running off before. You startled me, is all. Amadeus: 'Salright, no need to say you're sorry for somethin' like that. Ellarose: My name is Saria. ^.^ Amadeus: I'm Amadeus. Nice to meet you. Ellarose: OOOPS! *giggle* I seem to have dropped my hand! Ellarose: ***ooooooh, my*** Amadeus: Here you go! Ellarose: Thanks so much! *giggle* Amadeus: You're... um... Amadeus: Uh... Amadeus: WELCOME! You're welcome!

Amadeus: Now I've got a comb and pants! Things seem to be looking up. Indeed, I hope you like 'em... The pattern was made for a different sort of doll though, and the fabric is a little cheap. Amadeus: I bet Ellarose and Saria will love me now that I'm not creepy and half naked! I'm sure they will, dear. Amadeus: Can I ask you a question... You gotta promise to never repeat it! Yes yes, sure. Amadeus: *Whispers* Do they make my butt look big? Um... about that... Amadeus: Oh my GOD, its like the size of Texas! Or possibly all of Europe! Heh.. yeah I don't think the pattern turned out quite right... Amadeus: Quite right my massive behind! Amadeus: Take them back and do it again properly now. *Grumble* Fine.

Amadeus: *Sigh* Well great, the other one hates me. Didn't even take the time to meet me, but she hates me. Saria: Um... You left your comb behind. I thought... that... well maybe... you wanted it back? Amadeus: Huh? Saria: *thinking* Geez, he probably thinks I'm awful, saying all those mean things before I met him Amadeus: Oh! Uhm. Thanks, yeah... Its a good comb. Wouldn't want to lose it. Heh heh... *thinking* Oh god, oh god, don't blow it Amadeus... ~Excruciatingly long pause~ Saria: Well. Um. I guess I better go. Amadeus: Yeah... I'll see you around... Saria: See ya.. *thinking* He must hate me. Amadeus: Girls are weird... Me: I know, I know.

Saria: Oh good, there you are. I've been meaning to have a word with you. Saria: It's about Ellarose, she's been driving me up the friggin' -wall- all of a sudden. Amadeus: *thinking* Oh my god... oh my god... Its the other one, pleeeease don't look behind you.... Saria: She's just been spazzing about this new guy. I haven't met him yet, but I doubt he's worth the fuss she's making. Amadeus: *thinking* Hey... wait... that wasn't very nice. Saria: All in all, you've just made Ellarose even worse than she was before, the stuck up prick, and now I'm going to have to deal with this guy is too, as if we even -needed- a man around. With the way -she's- been going off he's probably just some stuck up jerk who thinks he's gods gift to women or something. I bet he isn't even cute. I hope you're properly ashamed of yourself, Lady. Saria: !! Amadeus: Erk! Saria: Oh! Amadeus: Bloody hell.

Amadeus: I really appreciate the comb, its so nice to get all those knots out. Amadeus: Maybe I won't scare away the next one now... course, you still haven't given me any pants yet, so I probably will anyway. *rustlerustle* Amadeus: I heard another sound! Amadeus: *Whimper* There's nowhere to hide this time!

Ellarose: What?! No! Not another one! Ellarose: I can't believe it! You got another one? Ellarose: You realize how awful this is! As if Saria wasn't bad enough!! Ellarose: Ooooh, what am I going to do!? *sobs daintily* Ellarose: You realize this is your fault, don't you? Amadeus: ! Me: . . . . Ellarose: I simply refuse to talk to you now. You're dead to me. Spending all that money on other pullips and not clothes for me. Amadeus: Rrrrrrowr! Ellarose: Wha?... Amadeus: Whoops! Ellarose: Oh my god! Its a boy!? Amadeus: That was hot. Me: *facepalm*

Amadeus: Well if there are girls around, I'm gunna have to find -something- to wear. Me: Uhm.... *shifty eyes* Amadeus: You're kidding. Right? Me: . . . . Amadeus: Right!? Amadeus: Well this is just great. A wolf suit and a granny night gown. What have you got to say for yourself? Me: I'm -sorry-! I spent so much money getting you here I'm broke! *Random noise* Amadeus: What was that!? Oh god, someone's coming! Amadeus: I can't let a girl see me like this!! Amadeus: I am stealthy... like ninja...

Amadeus: Oh my god, where am I....?? Amadeus: Eeep! Who'er you!? Me: I'm Laura... or Samsally... or "Lady" or "Ma'am"... Doesn't really matter. Amadeus: Riiiiiight. So why am I here then? And why is it so hot in here? Me: I brought you here to keep my girls company. And its not all that hot, you're just wearing a furry wolf suit. Amadeus: Ugh, well I'm taking it off then. You mentioned girls?? Me: Hm, yeah. Ellarose and Saria. They haven't been getting along all that well. Amadeus: Mmmmmm, girls...... Me: -_-;; Amadeus: What!? Don't look at me like that! Me: . . . .
